oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Moses McKissack Elementary School, Nashville, Tennessee, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An exterior view of the Moses McKissack Elementary School, located at 915 38th Avenue North, Nashville, Tennessee. The Moses McKissack School was built in 1954 to replace the old Clifton Elementary School located on 40th Avenue North. McKissack School opened in August 1954 with 725 students in grades 1-6 and 24 teachers. Overcrowding led to the addition of eight classrooms in 1958. Forms part of the Metro Archives Photographs Collection, Schools. 1 b&w photograph.
